name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a high-end smartphone with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a triple rear camera system, and 8GB of RAM.

name: Apple iPhone 12 Pro
description: The Apple iPhone 12 Pro is a premium smartphone with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, a triple rear camera system, and 6GB of RAM.

name: Google Pixel 5
description: The Google Pixel 5 is a high-end smartphone with a 6-inch OLED display, a dual rear camera system, and 8GB of RAM.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 is a next-generation gaming console with a powerful AMD processor, a custom graphics card, and an ultra-fast SSD.

name: Microsoft Xbox Series X
description: The Microsoft Xbox Series X is a next-generation gaming console with a custom AMD processor, a high-performance graphics card, and an ultra-fast SSD.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch is a hybrid gaming console that can be played on-the-go or connected to a TV. It has a 6.2-inch touchscreen display and detachable Joy-Con controllers.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2
description: The DJI Mavic Air 2 is a high-end drone with a 4K camera, 3-axis gimbal, and a range of up to 10km.

name: GoPro Hero 9 Black
description: The GoPro Hero 9 Black is a rugged action camera with a 5K camera.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: Wireless noise-cancelling headphones with up to 20 hours of battery life.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Wireless noise-cancelling headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and up to 4.5 hours of battery life.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and up to 12 hours of battery life.

name: JBL Flip 5
description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with up to 12 hours of battery life.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen)
description: Smart speaker with Alexa voice control and fabric design.

name: Google Nest Mini
description: Smart speaker with Google Assistant voice control and fabric design.
